weh_prefs_description_skin.message: Determines the appearance of the extension

weh_prefs_description_patronMsg.message: Replace several of LibLime's predefined patron messages with messages more often used by MPL circ

weh_prefs_description_validAddr.message: Alerts library staff when an unacceptable or restricted Madison address has been entered

weh_prefs_description_autoUserId.message: Autofill a patron's OPAC username to the value of their library card

weh_prefs_description_selectPSTAT.message: Automatically lookup PSTAT value for all libraries in the SCLS that sort by county subdivision or census tract number. If the PSTAT is able to be determined, a button will appear allowing staff to automatically select the geographically closest MPL location for the patron's home library

weh_prefs_description_forceDigest.message: Automatically selects the "Digests Only" option (when available) while selecting patron notification options

weh_prefs_description_restrictNotificati.message: Forces library staff to select either "Due Date" or "Advanced Notice" notification options, but not both

weh_prefs_description_middleName.message: Automatically generates a patron's middle initial from the first name field

weh_prefs_description_updateAccountType.message: Update JU -> AD and LUJ -> LU when saving a patron record if the patron is 18 years or older

weh_prefs_description_receiptFont.message: Determines the font size for the patron barcode printing function

weh_prefs_description_disableDropbox.message: Prevents staff from checking dropbox mode by disabling the checkbox
